resource.displayName: T.brucei 927 contigs and chromosomes
resource.extDbName: Sanger T. brucei 927 contigs and chromosomes
resource.extDbRlsDescrip: Sanger T. brucei 927 contigs and chromosomes|2009-10-06
resource.description:
Sequence data for Trypanosome brucei strain TREU (Trypanosomiasis Research Edinburgh University) 927/4 were downloaded from GeneDB (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. brucei was conducted by The Sanger Institute pathogen sequencing unit and TIGR.

resource.extDbName: Sanger T. brucei 927 contigs and chromosomes

This resource includes contig sequences and annotations for Trypanosoma brucei strain TREU 927. Sequence data for Trypanosome brucei strain TREU (Trypanosomiasis Research Edinburgh University) 927/4 were downloaded from GeneDB (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. brucei was conducted by The Sanger Institute pathogen sequencing unit and TIGR.

resource.description:
This resource includes chromosome and unassigned contig sequences and annotations for Trypanosoma brucei strain TREU 927. Sequence data for Trypanosome brucei strain TREU (Trypanosomiasis Research Edinburgh University) 927/4 were downloaded from GeneDB (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. brucei was conducted by The Sanger Institute pathogen sequencing unit and TIGR.

resource.displayName: T.brucei gambiense chromosomes
resource.description: Chromosome sequences for T.brucei gambiense obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute. Please visit GeneDB for project details and data release policies.

resource.displayName: T.brucei gambiense Genome Annotations
resource.description: This resource includes chromosome sequences and annotations for Trypanosoma brucei gambiense obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute. Please visit GeneDB for project details and data release policies.

resource.displayName: T. brucei brucei927 protein GO Associations
resource.pluginArgs: --externalDatabaseSpec "%EXT_DB_NAME%|%EXT_DB_RLS_VER%" --inputFile @downloadDir@/GOAssociations_Tbruceibrucei927/Tbruceibrucei927.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "Gene Ontology|1.748" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @pipelineDir@/logs/badGOTerms.log
resource.description: T. brucei brucei927 Gene Ontology associations from GeneDB.

resource.displayName: T. brucei gambiense protein GO Associations
resource.pluginArgs: --externalDatabaseSpec "%EXT_DB_NAME%|%EXT_DB_RLS_VER%" --inputFile @downloadDir@/GOAssociations_Tbruceigambiense/Tbruceigambiense.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "Gene Ontology|1.748" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @pipelineDir@/logs/badGOTerms.log
resource.description: T. brucei gambiense Gene Ontology associations from GeneDB.

resource.description:
Genes Dev. 2009 May 1;23(9):1063-76. Epub 2009 Apr 15.
Four histone variants mark the boundaries of polycistronic transcription units in Trypanosoma brucei. Siegel TN, Hekstra DR, Kemp LE, Figueiredo LM, Lowell JE, Fenyo D, Wang X, Dewell S, Cross GA. Laboratory of Molecular Parasitology, The Rockefeller University

resource.displayName: Splice Leader and Poly A Sites from RNASeq (George Cross)
resource.extDbRlsDescrip: Splice Leader and Poly A Sites from RNASeq (George Cross)
resource.description:
Genome-wide analysis of mRNA abundance in two life-cycle stages of Trypanosoma brucei and identification of trans-splicing and polyadenylation sites.
T. Nicolai Siegel, Doeke R. Hekstra, Xuning Wang, Scott Dewell and George A. M. Cross (submitted).

resource.displayName: Splice Leader and Poly A Sites from RNASeq (George Cross)
resource.unpack: executeIdSQL.pl --idSQL "update apidb.NEXTGENSEQ_ALIGN set intron_size = regexp_replace(regexp_substr(query_id,'\(\d+\)','1'),'[\(|\)]','') where intron_size is null and sample in ('curated_polyA','curated_splice')"
executeIdSQL.pl --idSQL "update apidb.NEXTGENSEQ_ALIGN set strand = decode(strand,'+','-','-','+') where sample = 'curated_polyA'"
resource.description:
Genome-wide analysis of mRNA abundance in two life-cycle stages of Trypanosoma brucei and identification of trans-splicing and polyadenylation sites.
T. Nicolai Siegel, Doeke R. Hekstra, Xuning Wang, Scott Dewell and George A. M. Cross (submitted).

resource.description:
Digital Gene Expression tags (DGE) was applied to T. brucei gambiense. Publication is available from the PubMed http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20175885

Digital gene expression analysis of two life cycle stages of the human-infective parasite, Trypanosoma brucei gambiense reveals differentially expressed clusters of co-regulated genes. BMC Genomics. 2010 Feb 22;11:124.

resource.description:
